summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1526, for the improvement of East Union Street, in the City of Seattle, from Twenty-fifth Avenue to Thirtieth Avenue, by grading and curbing the same, and by constructing concrete walks thereon, under Ordinance No. 16469, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
